name: Body Snatcher
description:
A game made for the Trijam #116

You are a mutant slime in a wasteland full of tree people with guns, they kill everything that moves. If you stand still you can become part of the scenario, and they will not notice you, and if you jump in their heads you can control them, and use their guns.

  1. Arrow keys to move. Up arrow jumps. When controlling an enemy you can't jump,
  2. Space to shoot; Only after control an enemy.
  3. Alt to end it; Only after control an enemy.
  4. R to restart, the game will probably bug in some parts, so this can be useful!

Color palette: https://lospec.com/palette-list/justparchment8

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
